paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted information on the TTR gene variant Glu89Gln, including penetrance data and individual case details.

patients.phenotype: progressive weakness in lower limbs, lumbar spinal stenosis, laryngeal amyloidosis

individual_records.phenotype_details: progressive weakness in lower limbs, operated for lumbar spinal stenosis, diagnosed with laryngeal amyloidosis
individual_records.evidence_sentence: A 53-year-old man presented with progressive weakness in lower limbs and operated for lumbar spinal stenosis.

functional_data.summary: The Glu89Gln mutation is associated with hereditary transthyretin amyloidosis.

variants.additional_notes: The patient exhibited atypical symptoms of hATTR.
key_quotes: Our patient suggested that hATTR with Glu89Gln may present with atypical symptoms.
